 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צוּם‎</span>] **verb** ==abstain from food, fast== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Arabic (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎צוּם‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צַמְתָּ‎</span> [[2Sam.12.21|2Sam 12:21]] 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צַמְתֶּם‎</span> [[Zech.7.5|Zech 7:5]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צַמְתֻּנִי‎</span> v[[Zech.7.5|Zech 7:5]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּ֫צָם‎</span> [[2Sam.12.16|2Sam 12:16]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּצוֺ֑ם‎</span> [[1Kgs.21.27|1Kgs 21:27]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָצוּם‎</span>[[Esth.4.16|Esth 4:16]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צוּמוּ‎</span> v[[Esth.4.16|Esth 4:16]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צוֺם‎</span> [[Zech.7.5|Zech 7:5]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָם‎</span> [[2Sam.12.23|2Sam 12:23]]; [[Neh.1.4|Neh 1:4]] — ***fast***, in mourning the dead [[1Sam.31.13|1Sam 31:13]] = [[1Chr.10.12|1Chr 10:12]]; [[2Sam.1.12|2Sam 1:12]] in worship (contrition, intercession, etc.) [[Jonah.20.26|Jonah 20:26]]; [[1Sam.7.6|1Sam 7:6]]; [[1Sam.2.16|1Sam 2:16]] (with accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צוֺם‎</span>; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּקֵּשׁ‎</span>), v[[2Sam.12.23|2Sam 12:23]] and (+<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּכָה‎</span>), v[[2Sam.12.21|2Sam 12:21]] v[[2Sam.12.22|2Sam 12:22]] (q. v. for explanation), [[Jer.14.12|Jer 14:12]]; [[Zech.7.5|Zech 7:5]] (+<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְפוֺד‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲצוֺם צַמְתֻּנִי‎</span> v[[Zech.7.5|Zech 7:5]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:117x»§ 117x</sup>) ***was it at all unto me*** [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>] ***that ye fasted ?*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָאֱהִי צָם‎</span> [[Neh.1.4|Neh 1:4]] (periphrase conjectural; +<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתְפַּלֵּל‎</span>), compare [[Ezra.8.23|Ezra 8:23]] (+<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּפֵּשׁ‎</span>), [[Esth.4.16|Esth 4:16]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> person ***for*** whom), v[[Esth.4.16|Esth 4:16]], [[Isa.58.3|Isa 58:3]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִנִּינוּ נַפְשֵׁנוּ‎</span>), v[[Isa.58.4|Isa 58:4]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> of thing), v[[Isa.58.4|Isa 58:4]] once in disappointment and vexation [[1Kgs.21.27|1Kgs 21:27]].
